message: I think in any life situation there is always a reason why it's happening. I am always trying to learn some good lesson from any difficult moments. Any losses are giving to as for the reason to find something else, or improve ourselves. Loosing love or trust always feels like a little death, but time will cure almost anything. Even if you don't have next to you somebody who you love, you can still continue loving them...
